import React from "react"; import prodImg from './productAssets/DetailsPageImages/microSilica.png' import prodImg2 from './productAssets/DetailsPageImages/microSilica2.png' import { Fade } from "react-awesome-reveal"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const MicroSilica = () => { useEffect(() => { // Scroll to the top of the page when the component mounts window.scrollTo(0, 0); }, []); var settings = { dots: true, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, arrows:true, fade:true }; return (

Microfine Silica Powder

{/* */}

Microfine Silica powder is highly micronized form of Silica Powder with particle size of 10-20 Microns.

Features

Precisely Processed

Uniformity in Composition

Fine Particle Size

Applications

Paints and Coatings

Ceramics

Epoxy Resin

Road Marking Paints

Plastic Filler

Particle Size

800-1000 Mesh
) } export default MicroSilica;
